briefdescription.para: Integrate a guiding center step for a struct of markers with RK4.

detaileddescription.para: This function calculates a guiding center step for a struct of NSIMD markers with RK4 simultaneously using SIMD instructions. All arrays in the function are of NSIMD length so vectorization can be performed directly without gather and scatter operations.

parameterdescription.para: simd_gc struct that will be updated
pointer to array containing time steps

briefdescription.para: Integrate a guiding center step with RK4 with MHD modes present.

detaileddescription.para: Same as previous function but with MHD present

parameterdescription.para: simd_gc struct that will be updated
pointer to array containing time steps
